topic.title: Nile.js , a per to peer live video streaming
Block the ID's messages you don't like.
topic.body: Copy the ID which you don't like, open http://127.0.0.1:43110/zeroid.bit/ , click `Search in user database...`, past it &mute it. you will block the ID's messages in the whole ZeroNet.

topic.title: Block the ID's messages you don't like in the whole ZeroNet.
topic.body: Copy the ID which you don't like, open http://127.0.0.1:43110/zeroid.bit/ , click `Search in user database...`, paste it &mute it. you will block the ID's messages in the whole ZeroNet.

2_15NSryspZZm6RTYdeAoPLxzT7zdpVksg2S.body:
> [hechaocheng2](#comment_2_1HYWELgixoPXKLEpsJaAuKuMT6GiRDfjdk): 像 “12s8s9uDELQeSmiTdLAmH7fvQJjQC2NNnr” 这样长度不好输入。

这种只能复制粘贴啦，这就是比特币收款地址，你把比特币打入这个钱包，拥有这个网站私钥的人就能收到款。如果在零网建个商城或者丝绸之路4.0啥的，把比特币打入这个地址，站长就能收款了。
你拉开小地球看看。。。每个网站都有个`捐赠`按钮，你想帮站长买个避孕套啥的，你可以捐赠比特币给他，收款地址就是网站地址

1_17Nkmf7uWjYV7PQ7ZhpeW2KYZDJdMTwHU6.body:
> [ury](#comment_2_1D4ZP1vgDrs4gEZn9t9Zvk9HfqXY6sbkjk): 你们共匪的办公大楼全是黄赌毒，这个问题怎么解？

各个领导都有私人包间，每天中午都有17~19分钟的午睡（性爱）时间。。。。。

1_1FMnvbmu5LLXtRBru5twpuMXdapiACaBpB.body: 不是，只是网速慢点而已

> [ehudu](#comment_1_1ArDm9BfJUTfrGQLDra6KKNYYqXWS7v2sp): 是的，点发布失败了

新站，你要先找人帮你打开你的网站，帮你做种。一开始都没人访问你的网站，你发给谁呢？哪能发布成功呢？

2_1CGFvMJ7z69o9yfAFin8TgqQUGka3k6vb9.body:
> [zer0surfer](#comment_7_15j9RixaGozV6Dwp3a9iigZNbjtUyz6Rbq): Hi, any idea why zeronet is so popular in china? Are there any good sites or cotent that attract many chinese users?

The richest man of BitCoin in China has shared ZeroNet on his blog, and he has opened his blog on ZeroNet.
[xiaolai@zeronet](/xiaolai.bit).
And thoese day, GuoWenGui's twitter has been blocked by China GOV.

1_1DMMSpE5s54ja9XxW2adGqMsFc5UxRpvEg.body:
大家注意辨别真假，郭文贵在推特上叫YouTube为you TooB，这里叫youtu。这不像郭文贵发的。
请看他的推特：[截图](/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/data/users/12yaKkoqVKBUi66uB5pYXamWguKFaWdDnx/img/tuite.png)
[推特推文](https://twitter.com/KwokMiles/status/866988015201157120)
看来郭文贵自创了很多名词，好让大家辨别真伪啊，不得不佩服老郭的智慧。
